thread.title: Vietnam Airlines announces flight adjustments due to typhoon DujuanTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Vietnam Airlines announces flight adjustments due to typhoon DujuanTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Vietnam Airlines announces flight adjustments due to typhoon DujuanTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Vietnam Airlines Announces Flight Adjustments Due to Typhoon Dujuan
As the typhoon Dujuan forecast to hit Taiwanâ€™s east coast on Monday afternoon, Vietnam Airlines will adjust total 6 flights between Vietnam and Taipei (Taiwan) on September 28th and 29th to ensure the safety for its passengers and operation. The affected flights are bellow:
On Monday, September 28th, 2 flights between Hanoi and Taipei (VN578/579) will be canceled. For the 2 flights on this route (VN567/577) on the next day, September 29th, Vietnam Airlines will upgrade to wide-body aircraft Boeing 777 (309 seats) instead Airbus A321 (184 seats) to serve more seats for its affected passengers.
The airlines will also delay its flight VN570 from Hochiminh city to Taipei on Monday until Tuesday morning. The new estimated departure time (ETD) will be 8:30 am (local time) on September 29th. Another flight, VN571 from Taipei to Hochiminh city will be rescheduled from the morning of September 29th to the afternoon at 14:00 pm (local time).
Source:- Vietnam Airlines
